phenomenon_signatures.positive_relief: Appears as a distinct, bright or light-colored area relative to its immediate surroundings, indicating it is topographically higher.
phenomenon_signatures.negative_relief: Appears as a distinct, dark or shadowed area relative to its immediate surroundings, indicating it is topographically lower.
phenomenon_signatures.subtle_topographic_pattern: Manifests as a faint but discernible geometric or organized texture that stands out from the natural terrain.
